6
Phase IV Equipment
No major changes except for replacement or upgrading to
meet technological change or to accomodate related activities
of the National Audio Center such as Demonstration and
Display.
Space
No major adjustment anticipated.
Support (Financial - Personnel)
Phase I Financial
The National Educational Radio Network is presently financed
by membership service charges. The current operating budget
if $68,000. It is anticipated that the budget for the fiscal
period July 1, 1969 to June 30, 1970 will continue at or
slightly above (Maximum $75,000) the present level.
While final approval is still pending, the Corporation for
Public Broadcasting has indicated a willingness to grant
